Klasse CustomHelpSelectionAdapter

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionAdapter
org.oxt.toolbox.helpers.CustomHelpSelectionAdapter
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
EventListener, org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionListener, org.eclipse.swt.internal.SWTEventListener
public class CustomHelpSelectionAdapter extends org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionAdapter
Helper class to implement a custom selection adapter for help page opening in external browser.
Autor:
Dr. Jan C. Thiele
